item.title: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA MEGA39’s Trailer, Release Date & More!
item.dc:creator: Noffy
item.description:
Hot off the heels of Magical Mirai 2019, we now know the release date, pricing, and a lot more about the features of Project DIVA MEGA39’s! The game is slated to release exclusively for Nintendo Switch on February 13th, 2020 in Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Korean! The western release, titled “Hatsune Miku: Project …

The post Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA MEGA39’s Trailer, Release Date & More! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hot off the heels of Magical Mirai 2019, we now know the release date, pricing, and a lot more about the features of Project DIVA MEGA39’s! The game is slated to release exclusively for Nintendo Switch on February 13th, 2020 in Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Korean! The western release, titled “Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Mega Mix” will follow later in 2020!Â  SEGA has also released additional information about the songs, gameplay, modules, a pre-order bonus, and more.

For the February 13th, 2020 release, there will be two editions of the game available: Standard Edition and Limited Edition. The standard edition of Project DIVA MEGA39’s will be priced at 5990 JPY. The limited edition will costÂ 9990 JPY.

Project DIVA MEGA39’s New Features

Project DIVA MEGA 39’s will feature two modes of gameplay: “Arcade” and “Mix”. The Arcade game mode will feature the classic arcade-style game play where you press buttons to the rhythm of the song. In the “Mix” game mode players will wave their JoyCon’s left and right to the vertical scrolling prompts on screen. In this mode, you can feel like you are performing a glowstick routine at a concert.

For yet another way to experience the songs in the game, a playlist feature will be available. This feature will allow you to put songs you enjoy in a playlist, sit back, and enjoy watching the gorgeous animated PVs one after another.

Song Information

SEGA has also announced that of the 10 new songs for MEGA 39’s, 5 will have new 3D model PVs new to the game, and 5 will use the original animated PVs for the songs. Dreamin Chuchu by emon(Tes.) is revealed to be one of the new songs, and the game will featureÂ its original video by Mogelatte!

Additionally, there will be a DLC “Theme Song Pack” featuring 4 theme songs from the Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA series.Â  The two songs in this pack confirmed so far now are The Secret Garden and Yume Yume. Those who pre-order Project DIVA MEGA39’s will receive a code to download this DLC pack before it releases for everyone else!

Finally, recent news about the Project DIVA MEGA39’s theme song “Catch the Wave”.Â The design for the module has been revealed and can be seen below! Also, due to an error where the song was not yet finished, the song has recently been re-published on nicovideo and YouTube

Project DIVA MEGA39’s Limited Edition Information

Priced at 9990 JPY,Â the Project DIVA MEGA39’s limited edition will come with:

  • A 5 disc CD collection of songs from previous Project DIVA games.
  • A CD track list booklet featuring illustrations on every page. The cover is illustrated by iXima
  • A SONOCA card that will let you download the theme song “Catch the Wave” by kz
  • All in a box illustrated by Miku’s original designer, KEI

HORI Controllers

In addition to game news, dedicated HORI controllers for the Project DIVA series were revealed and will release in early 2020. The controllers will be available for each the PS4 and Nintendo Switch.Â  For fans of Project DIVA Arcade, you will find that the button layout resembles the arcade layout near exactly, which is a first for official Project DIVA controllers! These HORI controllers will be made-for-order only with orders open until 10am on 9/24 (JST). Those who purchase a Nintendo Switch controller will also receive an exclusive T-shirt module design.
Check out the HORI STORE here!

Project DIVA MEGA39’s Website (Japanese)
Project DIVA Mega Mix Website (English)
Find the SEGA feat. HATSUNE MIKU project on theirÂ official website,Â Twitter, andÂ YouTube
Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese), Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese),Â YouTubeÂ andÂ Weibo
Be sure to take a look at Magical Mirai 2019â€™sÂ official websiteÂ andÂ Twitter!
Press Release

The post Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA MEGA39’s Trailer, Release Date & More! appeared first on VNN.

The post SEGA to Release Hatsune Miku: Ghost Rule Ver. Plushie in Late September 2019 appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
SEGA has revealed a new Hatsune Miku plushie hitting the arcades and shops this September, the Hatsune Miku GHOST Special Fuwafuwa ver. plushie!

The plushie design comes from Hatsune Mikuâ€™s outfit/module (design by Hassan) for the song â€œGhost Ruleâ€ from Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone, and is 27cm tall. According to SEGA, the plushie is expected to be available starting around the 4th week of September 2019.

Good luck catching her in arcades, or online!

Plushie Details Page: http://segaplaza.jp//channel/sub_channel.php?t=566&sub_channel_id=4932

Source: Mikufan.com

The post SEGA to Release Hatsune Miku: Ghost Rule Ver. Plushie in Late September 2019 appeared first on VNN.

item.title: SEGA Opens Twitter Poll For Arcade-Style Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Controller
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
SEGAâ€™s Project Diva team has opened a 7 day poll on Twitter to inquire Hatsune Miku fans about releasing an arcade-styled Hatsune Miku: Project Diva controller for the PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, or even both! The poll was likely sparked by the upcoming launch of Project Diva: MEGA 39â€™s for the Nintendo Switch. Fans can …

The post SEGA Opens Twitter Poll For Arcade-Style Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Controller appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
SEGAâ€™s Project Diva team has opened a 7 day poll on Twitter to inquire Hatsune Miku fans about releasing an arcade-styled Hatsune Miku: Project Diva controller for the PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, or even both! The poll was likely sparked by the upcoming launch of Project Diva: MEGA 39â€™s for the Nintendo Switch.

Fans can vote on the poll to choose which style controller(s) they would buy. Please only vote if you would actually buy the controller! We donâ€™t want the results getting skewed by over-excited fans. The following options are listed:

1: I want to buy a PS4 version.
2: I want to buy a Switch version.
3: I want to buy both versions.
4: I wont buy either versions.

The Project Diva team says the products listed are under consideration, and the winning choice might be produced for release in 2020. Cast your vote on the tweet below! The poll will close on July 19th at 7:00 PM JST.

item.title: SEGA Announces Project Diva 10th Anniversary Event Starting July 13th in Akihabara
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Starting on July 13th, 2019, SEGA will be holding a Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 10th anniversary celebration event in Akihabara, Japan! There youâ€™ll be able to enjoy exhibition activities, free gifts arcades, a stamp rally with a reward, and more! The event will run until August 12th. Check out the full details below! Project DIVA …

The post SEGA Announces Project Diva 10th Anniversary Event Starting July 13th in Akihabara appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Starting on July 13th, 2019, SEGA will be holding a Hatsune Miku: Project Diva 10th anniversary celebration event in Akihabara, Japan! There youâ€™ll be able to enjoy exhibition activities, free gifts arcades, a stamp rally with a reward, and more! The event will run until August 12th. Check out the full details below!

Project DIVA 10th Anniversary Exhibition

Location: Akib@ko (SEGA Akihabara 5th Building, 5th floor)
Dates: July 13th~August 12th

Various Miku related prize figures, character cutouts of modules chosen by arcade staff, and original drinks with coasters will be exhibited.

There are 3 kinds of Mikudayo coasters to collect, all with new artwork created for this campaign.

Stamp Rally

Location: SEGA Akihabara Buildings 1~5
Dates: July 13th~August12th

Collect all stamps from each of SEGAâ€™s buildings in Akihabara to collect a free memorial postcard! Entry to the stamp rally is free, so participate by all means!

Project Diva Prize Campaign

Location: SEGA Akihabara Buildings 1~5
Dates: July 13th ~ August 12th

SEGA staff will award you one clear file from the 5 above at random whenever you put 500 yen into a UFO catcher prize machine! Be sure to alert an arcade staff member when inserting the money to claim your free gift. Additionally, new SEGA limited prizes will be available at arcades. These will include visual acrylic boards (7 kinds), and Mikudayo acrylic keychains (6 kinds).

Sale of â€œMikudayo Yakiâ€

Location: SEGA Akihabara 5th Building (1st Floor)
Dates: July 21st~September 6th

Mikudayo motif versions of the popular Taiyaki snack food (a fish shaped pancake filled with bean jam) will be sold at the SEGA #5 building in Akihabara, and will also earn buyers a reward of a Mikudayo can badge as a gift, with 3 possible designs. The â€œMikudayo Yakiâ€ will be available in either the traditional bean flavor filling, or a cream filling.

Enjoy the celebrations in Akihabara should you happen to be in the area!

Via SEGA Miku Blog

 

Source: Mikufan.com

The post SEGA Announces Project Diva 10th Anniversary Event Starting July 13th in Akihabara appeared first on VNN.

One will be a theme song composed just for the game, 10 will be new songs to …

The post åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ Project DIVA MEGA39â€™s announced for Nintendo Switch! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Celebrating the 10th anniversary of the SEGA feat. HATSUNE MIKU Project, SEGA has announced the new game åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ Project DIVA MEGA39â€™sÂ (pronounced Mega Mix)Â which will release on Nintendo SwitchÂ Â early 2020!

 

Songs

The new game will feature 101 songs. One will be a theme song composed just for the game, 10 will be new songs to the series, and 90 will be returning songs from previous games!

SEGA so far has revealed two of the new songs:

Alien Alien by Nayutalien



39 Music! by MikitoP

New game mode

In addition to the standard Project DIVA rhythm gameplay, Project DIVA MEGA39â€™s will also feature a completely new mode of rhythm game play! Players will be able to switch between modes freely, similar to Project mirai’s button and touch mode options. The details of the new mode are not yet revealed, but it will be available to play at Magical Mirai 2019.

Visual style change

Project DIVA MEGA39â€™s will also feature a renewed visual look. The music videos now feature an animation-like style. It’s new and fresh at the same time!

 

 

piapro design contest

Additionally, SEGA and Crypton will be hosting a design contest on Piapro! The topic of the contest is T-shirt costume design, with the winners being featured as costumes in-game.Â  The contest will begin July 7th and last until August 15th!

Song DLC for PS4

ã€ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã€‘PS4ã€åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ Project DIVA Future Tone/DXã€ã‚’ãŠæŒã¡ã®æ–¹ã«å‘ã‘ã€åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ Project DIVA MEGA39'sã€ã‹ã‚‰ã®æ–°è¦åéŒ²æ¥½æ›²ç­‰ã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã—ãŸDLCã‚’ã€2020å¹´ã«æœ‰å„Ÿé…ä¿¡äºˆå®šã§ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡èª¿PVè¡¨ç¾ã¸ã®ãƒªãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚„æ–°ã—ã„ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã¯ã€ŒMEGA39'sã€ãªã‚‰ã§ã¯ã®è¦ç´ ã§ã™ã€‚ï¼‰ #pjd_sega

— SEGA feat. åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ å…¬å¼ (@pjd_sega) July 1, 2019

Finally, the new songs for Project DIVA MEGA39â€™s will be released as DLC on Project DIVA Future Tone andÂ Project DIVA Future Tone DXÂ inÂ 2020. However, the new style and game mode will be exclusive to Project DIVA MEGA39â€™s, so if you want to enjoy the new mode and visuals be sure to check it out!


On top of all this, SEGA has mentioned that they still have more in store for the Project DIVA series’ 10th anniversary! Stay tuned!

Find the SEGA feat. HATSUNE MIKU project on their official website, Twitter, and YouTubeÂ 
Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese), Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese),Â YouTubeÂ andÂ Weibo
Be sure to take a look at Magical Mirai 2019â€™s official websiteÂ andÂ Twitter!
Press Release

The post åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯ Project DIVA MEGA39â€™s announced for Nintendo Switch! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: SEGA Feat Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary -DAIBA De DIVA Series Super Live 2019- Event Announced!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The 10th Anniversary of Hatsune Miku‘s Project DIVA Series is approaching faster than ever, and it seems fans will be able to celebrate the event with a special DAIBA de DIVA Super Live concert on July 2nd! A Concert Celebrating 10 Years of Rhythmic Games! If there is something we are totally sure about, is …

The post SEGA Feat Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary -DAIBA De DIVA Series Super Live 2019- Event Announced! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The 10th Anniversary of Hatsune Miku‘s Project DIVA Series is approaching faster than ever, and it seems fans will be able to celebrate the event with a special DAIBA de DIVA Super Live concert on July 2nd!

A Concert Celebrating 10 Years of Rhythmic Games!

If there is something we are totally sure about, is that SEGA‘s Project DIVA game series are probably one of Miku’s biggest franchise, so we shouldn’t be surprised to know that such an huge game title would get some sort of celebration!

ã€SEGA feat. HATSUNE MIKU Projectã€ 10å‘¨å¹´è¨˜å¿µ

ã€SEGA feat. HATSUNE MIKU Project 10th Anniversary -DAIBA de DIVAã‚·ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚ºã€€ã‚¹ãƒ¼ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–2019-ã€
ã‚’7æœˆ2æ—¥ã«é–‹å‚¬

ãƒã‚±ãƒƒãƒˆã®ãŠç”³ã—è¾¼ã¿ã¯
6æœˆ11æ—¥10æ™‚ã‚ˆã‚Šã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆ#ã‚¸ãƒ§ã‚¤ãƒãƒªã‚¹#åˆéŸ³ãƒŸã‚¯https://t.co/gsZQCgev7T pic.twitter.com/O1WJlGUR5A

— æ±äº¬ã‚¸ãƒ§ã‚¤ãƒãƒªã‚¹ (@TokyoJoypolis) June 10, 2019

Most of the fans expected (or better hoped for) a new game entry to the series but, instead, we got something entirely different but surely as bigger as the expectations: a very special concert!

Date and Time

The concert will be held on June 2nd and it is limited to only 250 attenders.

The location is Tokyo Joypolis’ main stage at the 1st floor. Below you can find the map!

Doors will open at 7:30PM (JST), while the concert itself will begin at 8PM (JST)

Tickets Details

Tickets are priced 3,900 JPY, will come with a special case for itÂ  and there is a limit of two per person. However, they are not available for purchase: attenders will be chosen via lottery.

Applications will open on June 11st at 10PM (JST) via Lawson Ticket and will stay available until June 16th at 11:59PM (JST)

Are you interested into apply? Then click here!

Results will be announced on June 18th!

Sources

The fact that this concert is will only have 250 attenders and you need to apply to get a ticket, surely makes it quite an exclusive event. Even so, it might be an exceptional experience for any fan of Miku and the Project DIVA games, so we would like to wish good luck to everyone that decides to try winning a ticket!

Stay tuned with us on VNN for more exciting news on Virtual Singers and their world!

Hatsune Miku is on Facebook (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese), Twitter (EnglishÂ andÂ Japanese),Â YoutubeÂ andÂ Weibo
You can follow SEGA feat. Hatsune Miku’s project on Twitter and their website.
Event’s official page
Announcement Tweet

The post SEGA Feat Hatsune Miku 10th Anniversary -DAIBA De DIVA Series Super Live 2019- Event Announced! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: This 3rd Party Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Themed Controller Just Might Beat Official Ones
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Leave it to a smaller, independent controller creator to make what might be one of the better looking controllers out there for Hatsune Miku: Project Diva games. Hong Kong based 3rd party controller makerÂ GAMO2Â appears to have done just that with their teaser of the â€œDIVALLERâ€ USB controller for PS3, PS4 and PC platforms. The controller …

The post This 3rd Party Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Themed Controller Just Might Beat Official Ones appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Leave it to a smaller, independent controller creator to make what might be one of the better looking controllers out there for Hatsune Miku: Project Diva games. Hong Kong based 3rd party controller makerÂ GAMO2Â appears to have done just that with their teaser of the â€œDIVALLERâ€ USB controller for PS3, PS4 and PC platforms.

The controller button layout, as well as the inclusion of an actual arcade-style slide bar, might make for one of the most genuine arcade-like gameplay experiences for Project Diva players at home. Hereâ€™s to hoping this controller will function as well as it looks!

Being 3rd party, this controller is unofficial and purposely avoids any direct references to Hatsune Miku, minus the hairband and twin-tail decoration on the controller face. But Hatsune Miku fans will know quite well what this is for, and that means the design nailed it.

The controller is expected to be released around 4th quarter of 2019 for a currently unspecified amount, according toÂ GAMO2 on Twitter. The design may also not be finalized yet, so be sure to watch for updates.

DIVALLER #GAMO2 #Diva pic.twitter.com/vseSXgFLcM

— GAMO2 (@GamoTwo) May 17, 2019

Source: Mikufan.com

The post This 3rd Party Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Themed Controller Just Might Beat Official Ones appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Preorders Open!
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
Highly anticipated Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure, also familiar among Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA series’ fans as “Rin Future Style” module, is now open for preorder! She is priced at 10,800 yen, with shipment scheduled for March 2019. Preorders will be open at Good Smile Company Online Shop until November 8th, …

The post Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Highly anticipated Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure, also familiar among Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA series’ fans as “Rin Future Style” module, is now open for preorder! She is priced at 10,800 yen, with shipment scheduled for March 2019. Preorders will be open at Good Smile Company Online Shop until November 8th, 2018.

The adult version of Rin-chan, now made into a scale figure!

From Owata-P’s popular song with over a million views, “Rin-chan Now!”, comes a 1/8th scale figure of the adult version of Rin as designed by Hiro Tamura! From her long hair flowing down to her waist, to her somewhat more mature expression and body language, the charming aura about her is quite different from the 14-year-old version of herself! Be sure to add the beautiful adult version of Rin to your collection!

You can place your preorder from the links below:

GSC Online Shop

AmiAmi

Source: Product Information Page.

The post Kagamine Rin “Rin-chan Nau!” Adult Ver. 1/8 Scale Figure Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: 10 Songs in Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone Receiving Extra Extreme Updates
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
Itâ€™s been a while since we heard news regarding Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone for PS4, but SEGA hasnâ€™t forgotten about the game! They recently announced that 10 songs will be updated to add Extra Extreme difficulties in a free patch that will be distributed on April 19th to Project Diva Future Tone, as …

The post 10 Songs in Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone Receiving Extra Extreme Updates appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Itâ€™s been a while since we heard news regarding Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone for PS4, but SEGA hasnâ€™t forgotten about the game! They recently announced that 10 songs will be updated to add Extra Extreme difficulties in a free patch that will be distributed on April 19th to Project Diva Future Tone, as well as Project Diva Future Tone DX. Hereâ€™s the songs getting the update!

Future Sound Pack: Love Words, The Intense Voice of Hatsune Miku, Magnet, Rolling Girl

Colorful Tone Pack: Jugemu Sequencer, Soiyassa!!, Time Limit, Hanamai Tsukuyomi Tan, Mousou Sketch, Leia

Of course, if you purchased both packs in Future Tone, or picked up the DX version of the game, all of the above songs will be updated automatically when you launch the game while connected to the PlayStation Network. The update also notes some stability and bug fixes.

This update announcement currently applies to the Japanese version of the game, and news regarding the update for Western releases is still pending. Itâ€™s also unknown if the arcade version of Future Tone will get the update, or if it already got it. Weâ€™ll keep you posted!

Source: Mikufan.com

The post 10 Songs in Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Future Tone Receiving Extra Extreme Updates appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Hatsune Miku DAIBA de DIVA Future Tone DX Announced for Tokyo Joypolis in Odaiba, Tokyo
item.dc:creator: Kuroi
item.description:
In celebration of the soon-to-launch Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone DX this November, Sega will be holding a collaboration event with the indoor theme park Tokyo Joypolis on October 12th~November 26th.Â The event is called â€œHatsune MikuÂ DAIBA de DIVA Future Tone DXâ€œ, andÂ will feature mini-live held everyday as well as attractions, special photo spot, Mikudayo, …

The post Hatsune Miku DAIBA de DIVA Future Tone DX Announced for Tokyo Joypolis in Odaiba, Tokyo appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In celebration of the soon-to-launch Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Future Tone DX this November, Sega will be holding a collaboration event with the indoor theme park Tokyo Joypolis on October 12th~November 26th.Â The event is called â€œHatsune MikuÂ DAIBA de DIVA Future Tone DXâ€œ, andÂ will feature mini-live held everyday as well as attractions, special photo spot, Mikudayo, collaboration goods, and special menus.

Official site â†’Â http://tokyo-joypolis.com/event/DdDIVA_Ft/index.html
Project DIVA Future Tone DX â†’ http://miku.sega.jp/FT/

Mini-live Daily

A series of special mini-live will be held daily at the main stage of the hall! There will be two setlists with three songs performed at specific intervals, including many songs from the game as well as the song â€œGhost Ruleâ€ byÂ DECOï¼Š27Â to follow as DLC in December.

October 12th~November 3rd
14:00 JST â€“ â€œWorld is Mineâ€ (ryo), â€œRomeo and Cinderellaâ€ (doriko), â€œTell Your Worldâ€ (kz)
17:00 JST â€“ â€œRemote Controlâ€ (JesusP), â€œGhost Ruleâ€ (DECOï¼Š27), and â€œSenbonzakuraâ€ (KurousaP)
19:00 JST â€“Â  â€œHajimete no Otoâ€ (malo), â€œLast Night, Good Nightâ€ (kz), and â€œ39â€ *(sasakure.UK x DECOï¼Š27)

November 4th~26th
14:00 JST â€“Â â€œWeekender Girlâ€ (kz x HachioujiP), â€œODDS&ENDSâ€ (ryo), and â€œTime Machineâ€ (1640mP)
17:00 JST â€“ â€œRemote Controlâ€ (JesusP), â€œGhost Ruleâ€ (DECOï¼Š27), and â€œSenbonzakuraâ€ (KurousaP)
19:00 JST â€“ â€œTwo-faced Loversâ€ (wowaka), â€œMiracle Paintâ€ (OSTER project), and â€œTell Your Worldâ€ (kz)

â€» image below is from the past event

DAIBA de DIVA SUPER LIVE

In addition to the mini-live, the DAIBA de DIVA SUPER LIVE has been announced and will feature all the songs performed from the past events held at Tokyo Joypolis in celebration of Hatsune Miku 10th anniversary. The SUPER LIVE will be held on November 24th with doors to open at 19:15 JST.

Gekion Live Coaster & Fortune Forest

In the corner of attractions, the popular â€œGekion Live Coasterâ€,Â a part music game and part roller coaster attraction, will be in Project DIVA Future Tone DXÂ wrappings during the collaboration period, and features one of the following songs to play with:

â€œHand in Handâ€ (kz), â€œSand Planetâ€ (Hachi), â€œSenbonzakuraâ€ (KurousaP), â€œMiku Miku ni Shite Ageruâ™ªâ€ (ika), â€œGhost Ruleâ€ (DECOï¼Š27), â€œHibikaseâ€ (GigaP), â€œTell Your Worldâ€ (kz), or
â€œDECORATORâ€ (kz).
